summary: This bill, the Veterans' Transition to Trucking Act of 2025, aims to amend Title 38 of the United States Code to allow the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to approve multi-State apprenticeship programs for veterans' educational assistance. Specifically, it allows the Secretary to act as a State approving agency for multi-State apprenticeship programs, thereby facilitating veterans' access to educational benefits for participation in these programs primarily related to the trucking industry.
